Name: Cheeky Monkey
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: Fire yellow in colour, this drink features the distinctive flavour of Chartreuse with a citrus supporting cast.
History: Created in 2001 by Tony Conigliaro at Isola, Knightsbridge, London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Cheeky Monkey contains 191 calories
